formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1) Change in velocity over time: \( a = \dfrac{\Delta v}{t} = \dfrac{v - u}{t} \) 2) Newton’s second law: \( a = \dfrac{F}{m} \) 3) From displacement, initial velocity, and time: \( a = \dfrac{2(s - ut)}{t^2} \) 4) From initial and final velocities and displacement: \( a = \dfrac{v^2 - u^2}{2s} \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
